messages.content: Who is the lead of GDG IET DAVV?
The current GDGoC Lead is Yash Jain, and the Co-Lead is Kavyansh Saxena.
Tell me about the project 'Shatranj' or chess apps built by the club.

While there isn't a project explicitly named 'Shatranj' in the latest data, there is a relevant project called 'Red Light Green Light Squid Game' built by Yashasvi Sharma and Harsh Gupta. For other game-related projects, 'Vent Chase' is an Among Us inspired game built by Rudra Pratap Singh and Uthkarsh Mandloi.
What tech stack was used for the 404 System Failure Portal?
The 404 System Failure Portal uses HTML, CSS, and Javascript. It was developed by Utkarsh Mandloi, Parv Jain, and Atharv Porwal.
When is the registration deadline for Hack'Vento 2k26?
Registration for Hack'Vento 2k26 closes on December 31, 2025. The event requires a team size of 4 members.
Can I participate in Hack'Vento alone?
No, solo participation is not allowed in Hack'Vento 2k26. You are required to form a team of exactly 4 members.
Who developed the GDG IET DAVV official website?
The official revamped website was developed by Atharv Garg and Darpan Porwal using React, Vite, Typescript, and Supabase.
Is there an app for college resources?
Yes, the 'IET Connect App' was built as a one-stop platform for notes, syllabi, and events. It was developed using React Native by Manas Bhandari, Huzefa Qureshi, and Mohit Maravi.
What are the themes for the Hack'Vento hackathon?

The challenge themes for Hack'Vento 2k26 include: Adaptive Student Time Utilisation, Gamification of Community Learning, Centralized Internship & Placement Tracking, Mental Well-Being Support, and Open Innovation.
Who handles AI/ML at the club?
Parv Jain is the AI/ML Lead for the club.
Does the club have any projects using Python?
Yes, the 'Automated Event Ticketing & Attendance System' uses a Python backend (along with Google Cloud and MongoDB), and the 'Certificate Automation' project also utilizes Python.
